abstract: Computers using Chrome, which uses “cloud computing,” will not arrive for a year, but it is already seen as a potential challenger to Microsoft.
snippet: Computers using Chrome, which uses “cloud computing,” will not arrive for a year, but it is already seen as a potential challenger to Microsoft.
lead_paragraph: MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif.  Google began lifting the veil on its planned Chrome operating system on Thursday, but it said that computers powered by the software would not be available for a year.

headline.main: Google Offers Peek at Operating System, a Potential Challenge to Windows
headline.print_headline: Google Offers Peek at Operating System, a Potential Challenge to Windows
